verses.verse: וַ֠יָּשָׁב <WH7725> returned יְהוֹשָׁפָ֨ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָ֧ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֛וֹ <WH1004> to his house בְּשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> in peace לִֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> to meet יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> And Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חֲנָ֘נִי֮ <WH2607> of Hanani הַחֹזֶה֒ <WH2374> the seer וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> him and said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to king יְהוֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> Jehoshaphat הֲלָרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> the ungodly לַעְזֹ֔ר <WH5826> Shouldest thou help וּלְשֹׂנְאֵ֥י <WH8130> them that hate יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD תֶּאֱהָ֑ב <WH157> and love וּבָזֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> and קֶּ֔צֶף <WH7110> [is] wrath מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> upon thee from before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

אֲבָ֕ל <WH61> Nevertheless דְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> things טוֹבִ֖ים <WH2896> there are good נִמְצְא֣וּ <WH4672> found עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בִעַ֤רְתָּ <WH1197> in thee in that thou hast taken away הָאֲשֵׁרוֹת֙ <WH842> the groves מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> out of the land וַהֲכִינ֥וֹתָ <WH3559> and hast prepared לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> thine heart לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> to seek הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem ס וַיָּ֜שָׁב <WH7725> again וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> and he went out בָעָ֗ם <WH5971> through the people מִבְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH884> from Beersheba עַד־ <WH5704> against הַ֣ר <WH2022> to mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיְשִׁיבֵ֕ם <WH7725> and brought them back אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <WH5975> And he set שֹֽׁפְטִ֜ים <WH8199> judges בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> in the land בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֧י <WH5892> cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <WH1219> throughout all the fenced לְעִ֥יר <WH5892> city וָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> by city

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַשֹּֽׁפְטִ֗ים <WH8199> to the judges רְאוּ֙ <WH7200> Take heed מָֽה־ <WH4100> what אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you עֹשִׂ֔ים <WH6213> what ye do כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֧א <WH3808> for לְאָדָ֛ם <WH120> not for man תִּשְׁפְּט֖וּ <WH8199> for ye judge כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> but for the LORD וְעִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> you בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> render מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now יְהִ֥י <WH1961> let פַֽחַד־ <WH6343> Wherefore now let the fear יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and שִׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> be upon you take heed וַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and do כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֞ין <WH369> will have עִם־ <WH5973> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God עַוְלָ֛ה <WH5766> [it] for [there is] no iniquity וּמַשֹּׂ֥א <WH4856> nor respect פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> of persons וּמִקַּח־ <WH4727> nor taking שֹֽׁחַד׃ <WH7810> of gifts

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also בִּ֠ירוּשָׁלִַם <WH3389> Moreover in Jerusalem הֶעֱמִ֨יד <WH5975> set יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <WH3092> did Jehoshaphat מִן־ <WH4480> some הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <WH3881> of the Levites וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> and [of] the priests וּמֵרָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> and of the chief הָאָבוֹת֙ <WH1> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <WH4941> for the judgment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וְלָרִ֑יב <WH7379> and for controversies וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> when they returned יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> And he charged עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> them saying כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus תַעֲשׂוּן֙ <WH6213> Thus shall ye do בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> in the fear יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֶּאֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> faithfully וּבְלֵבָ֥ב <WH3824> heart שָׁלֵֽם׃ <WH8003> and with a perfect

וְכָל־ <WH3605> any רִיב֩ <WH7379> And what cause אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whenever יָב֨וֹא <WH935> soever shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5921> unto מֵאֲחֵיכֶ֣ם ׀ <WH251> to you of your brethren הַיֹּשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> that dwell בְּעָרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5892> in their cities בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between דָּ֣ם ׀ <WH1818> between blood לְדָם֮ <WH1818> and blood בֵּין־ <WH996> between תּוֹרָ֣ה <WH8451> between law לְמִצְוָה֮ <WH4687> and commandment לְחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> statutes וּלְמִשְׁפָּטִים֒ <WH4941> and judgments וְהִזְהַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH2094> ye shall even warn אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> so יֶאְשְׁמוּ֙ <WH816> them that they trespass לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> not against the LORD וְהָֽיָה־ <WH1961> may come קֶ֥צֶף <WH7110> and [so] wrath עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> and וְעַל־ <WH5921> on אֲחֵיכֶ֑ם <WH251> come upon you and upon your brethren כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> this תַעֲשׂ֖וּן <WH6213> do וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> so תֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <WH816> and ye shall not trespass

וְהִנֵּ֡ה <WH2009> Behold אֲמַרְיָ֣הוּ <WH568> And behold Amariah כֹהֵן֩ <WH3548> priest הָרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> the chief עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5921> will be over לְכֹ֣ל <WH3605> all דְּבַר־ <WH1697> [is] over you in all matters יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּזְבַדְיָ֨הוּ <WH2069> and Zebadiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יִשְׁמָעֵ֜אל <WH3458> of Ishmael הַנָּגִ֤יד <WH5057> the ruler לְבֵית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לְכֹ֣ל <WH3605> all דְּבַר־ <WH1697> matters הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> for all the king's וְשֹׁטְרִ֥ים <WH7860> [shall be] officers הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> also the Levites לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before חִזְק֣וּ <WH2388> courageously וַעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> you Deal וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> be with הַטּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> shall be with the good פ
